Articles.Content:
I am having a bit of an issue with my copy of the game for the past couple of months now. I click the play button on the launcher but it does not start the game. I've done a completely fresh install, deleting all files related to it but nothing has seemed to work.

Specs:

GPU: 3070ti 
CPU: Ryzen 5 3600x
RAM: 32gb DDR4
Game is installed on an SSD.

Do you know perchance how many hours you already have in the game? Recently there was a big discovered with the game related to Windows registry, symptoms here sound similar to what that bug apparently causes

https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/topic/219607-ksp2-is-spamming-the-windows-registry-over-weeksmonths-until-the-game-will-stop-working-permanently/

Edited September 28, 2023 by Stoup
Steam says 12 hours, but I sometimes would launch through the .exe, so maybe around 20 or 25. I'll try this out and if it works I'll mark it as a solution, thanks!
